title: eppuDu krupa galkunO
sahitya:
epuDu krpa galgunO inakula tilaka nIku

anupallavi

 epuDaina krIgaNTa jUcitE cAluvani enci ninnE cAla nammiyunna nApai

caraNam

talli taNDriyanna guru deivamu nIvEyani dalaci evvaganaina nannu brOtu vanucunA-
Yullamunandu cAla nammika galavADaiyuNDu-Deruga vEmi venkatEshvara nApai
